translations.chinese: 耳敗走降漢，漢王厚遇之。
translations.english: Zhang Er was defeated, fled, and surrendered to Han. King Han treated him generously.

translations.chinese: 陳餘迎代王歇還趙，歇立餘為代王。
translations.english: Chen Yu welcomed King Dai Xie back to Zhao. Xie established Yu as King of Dai.

translations.chinese: 張良自韓間行歸漢，漢王以為成信侯。
translations.english: Zhang Liang secretly made his way back to Han from Korea. King Han enfeoffed him as Lord Chengxin.

translations.chinese: 漢王如陝，鎮撫關外父老。
translations.english: King Han went to Shan and pacified the elders outside the passes.

translations.chinese: 河南王申陽降，置河南郡。
translations.english: King Henan Shen Yang surrendered. Henan commandery was established.
